nodes.text: Romo Vax's Hideout was a bunker on the Outer Rim world of Tatooine used by the Sennex spy Romo Vax during the time of the Galactic Civil War. It was located a short distance away from Jabba's Palace. Circa 1 ABY, the hideout was attacked by Bib Fortuna's henchmen when Romo Vax was identified to plot against Jabba Desilijic Tiure's criminal empire.
Romo Vax's Hideout was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
